name: Sacrifices
location: A claimed hex in the area of influence of a settlement secretly chosen by the GM
description: A cabal of cultists begin snatching citizens and preparing them for sacrifice to their vile god. The cultists maintain a hidden base of operations somewhere near one of the kingdom’s settlements.
resolution: A critical success ends this continuous event. The GM can instead build a short adventure for the PCs to track down and defeat the sinister cultists in encounter mode, provided the PCs know where to go to confront the cultists!

criticalSuccess.msg: The cultists are defeated, and many of your captured citizens are rescued.

success.msg: The cult continues to function, but you have managed to determine which hex their base of operations is located in. The DC to defeat the Sacrifices event is reduced by 4 in subsequent turns. @gain1Unrest

modifiers.name: Sacrifices: Success
modifiers.buttonLabel: Reduce DC of Fighting Cult on Subsequent Turns

failure.msg:
The cultists prey on travelers, hunters, trappers, and anyone else who strays too far from civilization. @gain1d4Unrest and increase a Ruin of your choice by 1
  • @gain1Corruption
  • @gain1Crime
  • @gain1Decay
  • @gain1Strife

criticalFailure.msg:
As failure, but the cultists start snatching victims from your settlements. If you’ve already determined where they’ve based their operations, they successfully relocate to a new secret hex as chosen by the GM, and the DC to defeat the cultists returns to normal. @gain1d6Unrest and increase two Ruins of your choice by 2
  • @gain2Crime
  • @gain2Corruption
  • @gain2Decay
  • @gain2Strife
